skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily haikus
des: Traditional Japanese poems of seventeen syllables, in three lines of five, seven, and five, traditionally evoking images of the natural world. In modern poetry, haiku poems cover various topic, often sarcastic, funny, but ironic and profound.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
